sentences.sentence: Oh no! I mean fuscous jacket I'm wearing, Your Royal Highness.
sentences.translation: 不，不，陛下，我意思是今天穿的外套深褐色。

sentences.sentence: Notes to attention: when adjust colorful transparent groove, test is needed to determine use it or not use it as obvious shrinkage may encountered at spiculate margin caused by the fuscous .
sentences.translation: 注意事项：在配彩色透明槽时，要特别注意本漆对很浓很深的颜色，在尖锐的边角处可能会有明显的缩边现象，需要事先加以实验后再确定使用或不使用。
